name: Deadlift
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Grip the barbell with both hands just outside your knees.
Lift the barbell by extending your hips and knees.
Lower the barbell back to the ground with control.

name: Bent Over Rows
instructions: Bend at the hips with your back flat, keeping the barbell close to your shins.
Pull the barbell towards your waist, keeping your elbows tight to your body.
Slowly lower the barbell back down with control.

name: Pull Ups
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you.
Pull your body upwards towards the bar by contracting your back muscles.
Lower yourself back to the starting position with control.

name: Seated Incline DB Curls
instructions: Sit on an incline bench and hold a dumbbell in each hand.
Curl the weights up towards your shoulders, focusing on your biceps.
Lower the weights back down slowly to the starting position.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with your legs straight.
Raise your legs towards the ceiling while keeping them straight.
Slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.

name: Planks
instructions: Lie on your stomach and raise your body up on your forearms and toes.
Keep your body straight from head to heels.
Hold the position for as long as possible, maintaining proper form.

name: Weighted Crunches
instructions: Lie on your back with your knees bent and hold a dumbbell to your chest.
Curl your upper body towards your knees, engaging your abs.
Slowly lower your back to the ground with control.

name: Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a bench and grip the barbell with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Lower the barbell to your chest and press it back up to the starting position.

name: Overhead Press
instructions: Stand with a barbell at shoulder height.
Press the barbell overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the barbell back to the starting position.

name: Push Ups
instructions: Start in a plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows.
Push your body back up to the starting position.

name: Lateral Raises
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand by your sides.
Raise the dumbbells out to the sides until your arms are parallel to the ground.
Lower the dumbbells back down slowly to the starting position.

name: Tricep Extensions
instructions: Hold a dumbbell overhead with both hands.
Lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending your elbows.
Extend your arms back to the starting position.

name: One Arm Tricep Pushdowns
instructions: Set up the cable machine with a rope attachment.
Grip the rope with one hand and pull it down until your arm is fully extended.
Slowly return to the starting position.

name: Back Squat
instructions: Place the barbell on your upper traps and stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Bend your knees and lower your body until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Push through your heels to return to the standing position.

name: Front Squat
instructions: Position the barbell across your front deltoids and grip the bar with your hands.
Squat down by bending your knees until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Push through your heels to return to the starting position.

name: Standing Calf Raises
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Rise up onto the balls of your feet, lifting your heels off the ground.
Slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.

name: Leg Curls
instructions: Lie face down on the leg curl machine and position the pad against your lower legs.
Curl your legs up as far as possible while keeping your hips stationary.
Slowly lower the weight back down.

name: Leg Extensions
instructions: Sit on the leg extension machine and adjust the seat so your knees are aligned with the pivot point.
Extend your legs until they are straight, squeezing your quads at the top.
Slowly lower the weight back down.

name: Cable Chest Flyes
instructions: Set the cables at chest height and grab the handles with both hands.
Step forward and pull the cables together in front of your chest.
Slowly return the cables to the starting position.

name: Barbell Rows
instructions: Bend at the hips and knees, keeping your back flat and gripping the barbell.
Pull the barbell towards your lower chest.
Lower the barbell back down with control.

name: Face Pulls
instructions: Attach a rope to a cable machine at head height.
Pull the rope towards your face, keeping your elbows high.
Slowly return to the starting position.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit in the leg press machine and position your feet shoulder-width apart on the platform.
Push the platform away from you by extending your legs.
Slowly lower the weight back down to the starting position.

name: Incline DB Bench Press
instructions: Set an incline bench at about 30-45 degrees.
Press the dumbbells up and lower them until your elbows are at a 90-degree angle.
Push the dumbbells back up to the starting position.

name: Hammer Curls
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your torso.
Curl the dumbbells as you keep your upper arms stationary.
Slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.

name: Bulgarian Split Squats
instructions: Place one foot behind you on a bench or elevated surface.
Lower your back knee towards the ground while keeping your chest upright.
Press through your front heel to return to the starting position.

name: T-Bar Rows
instructions: Stand over the T-bar row machine and grip the handles.
Pull the bar towards your torso while squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Slowly return to the starting position.

name: Lat Pull Downs
instructions: Sit at the lat pull-down machine and grip the bar wider than shoulder-width.
Pull the bar down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Slowly return to the starting position.

name: Cable Rows
instructions: Sit at the cable row machine with your feet firmly placed.
Pull the handle towards your torso while squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Slowly return to the starting position.

name: Dips
instructions: Grip the dip bars and raise yourself up.
Lower your body by bending your elbows, keeping your torso upright.
Push yourself back up to the starting position.
